<div class="left w75 mb_w100"><div class="left w50 mb_w100"><h3>Rider</h3><div class="rdr-img-cont"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/statistics/overview"><img src="images/riders/bp/fe/carlos-verona-2022.jpeg"  /></a></div><div class="rdr-info-cont"><b>Date of birth:</b> 4<sup>th</sup> November 1992 (29)<br /><b>Nationality:</b> <span class="flag  es"></span><a class="black" href="nation/spain">Spain</a><br /><span><b>Weight:</b> 68 kg &nbsp; <span><b>Height:</b> 1.86 m<br /><b>Place of birth:</b> <a href="location.php?id=4534">San Lorenzo de El Escorial</a><br /><div class="pps"><h4>Points per specialty</h4><ul><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg green" style="width: 38.973897389739%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">433</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/results/career-points-one-day-races">One day races</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg red" style="width: 100%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">1111</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/results/career-points-gc">GC</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg blue" style="width: 1.8901890189019%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">21</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/results/career-points-time-trial">Time trial</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg orange" style="width: 4.1404140414041%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">46</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/results/career-points-sprint">Sprint</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg purple" style="width: 93.159315931593%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">1035</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/carlos-verona/results/career-points-climbers">Climber</a></div></li></ul></div><div class=""></div>

<tr ><td class="season  " >2015</td><td class="bar  " ><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 21.9%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">121</span></div></td><td class="ac  " >505</td></tr>
<tr ><td class="season  " >2014</td><td class="bar  " ><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 17.7%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">98</span></div></td><td class="ac  " >550</td></tr>
<tr ><td class="season  " >2013</td><td class="bar  " ><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 12.3%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">68</span></div></td><td class="ac  " >706</td></tr>
<tr ><td class="season  " >2011</td><td class="bar  " ><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 2.9%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">16</span></div></td><td class="ac  " >1447</td></tr>
</tbody></table></div>
</div><div class="clear"></div><script>
$(document).ready(function(){
  var id = 137768; 
  var natid = 0; 
  var cxid = 0; 
  var seo = 'carlos-verona';
  var sort = 'date'; 
  var pid = '1238'; 
  var discipline = 'road'; 
  var subpath = '';   
    
  $(document).on('click', '.toggleDiscipline', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();        
    discipline = $(this).attr('data-discipline');
    id = $(this).attr('data-rid');
    //console.log('dis: '+discipline+', id: '+$(this).attr('data-rid')+', season: '+$(this).attr('data-season'));
    $('.rdrSeasonNav').hide();
    $('.rdrSeasonNav[data-discipline="'+discipline+'"]').show(); 
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li").removeClass('cur');
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li[data-season="+$(this).attr('data-season')+"]").addClass('cur');
    var url = 'rider/'+seo+'/'+discipline;
    //history.pushState("string", "page", url);  
    $(this).parents('ul').find('li').removeClass('cur');
    $(this).parent('li').addClass('cur'); 
    //console.log(subpath);
    $.ajax({  method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1, id: id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, sort: sort, pid: pid, discipline: discipline, season: $(this).attr('data-season') }  }).done(function( response ) {     $('#resultsCont').html(response);      })  
  });   

  $(document).on('click', '.seasonResults', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();       
    var season = $(this).attr('data-season');  
    
  
    $("#resultsCont").html('<br /><div class=\"loading\"> loading results ..</div>');
    var url = 'rider/'+seo+'/'+season;
    history.pushState("string", "page", url);  
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li").removeClass('cur');
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li[data-season="+season+"]").addClass('cur'); 

    $.ajax({  method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1, id: id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, season: season, sort: sort, pid: pid, discipline: discipline  }  }).done(function( response ) {   
    	//console.log(response);
      $('#resultsCont').html(response);      
    })
     
  });    
    
  $(".sortByResults a").click(function(e){
    e.preventDefault();        
    var season = $(".rdrSeasonNav li.cur").attr('data-season');
    $("#resultsCont").html('<br /><div class=\"loading\"> loading results ..</div>');
    $(".sortByResults a").removeClass('cur');
    $(this).addClass('cur');
    sort = $(this).attr('data-case');
   // console.log('dis: '+discipline+', season: '+season+', sort: '+sort+', cxid: '+cxid+', natid: '+natid+', id: '+id);
   
    $.ajax({ method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1,id:id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, season: season, sort: $(this).attr('data-case'), pid: pid, discipline: discipline  }  }).done(function( response ) {    $('#resultsCont').html(response);   }) 
  }); 

});
</script>

</div>
<div class="desktop-ad below-content rider"></div><div class="mob-ad below-content rider"></div></div><div style="clear: both; "></div>  
  </div>
  </center>
  <div class="push"></div>
</div>
